attributes.action: let Grandparents be entitled to receive the Childcare Element of Tax Credits for looking after their Grandchildren.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently working people with children are entitled to receive help with childcare costs but have to use a recognised childcare provider. I believe that Grandparents should be eligible to receive this money. I believe that more people would return to work if they could leave their children with people they trust such as the childs Grandparents. Many Grandparents cannot afford to give up work to care for Grandchildren and many Mothers do not want to leave babies in childcare. Let the money or at least a percentage of it be used for paying Grandparents.
